        • Message readMessage(Socket socket)

          Reads a Jupyter message from a ZMQ socket. Each message consists of at least six blobs of bytes:

          • zero or more identities
          • '<IDS|MSG>'
          • HMAC signature
          • header
          • parent header
          • metadata
          • content
          Returns:
          a newly initialized Message object.
          Parameters:
          socket - The ZMQ.Socket object to read from.

        • void run()

        • void send(Message message)
